name: OrganicApex
overview:
OrganicApex is a Specialized Digital Marketing Firm with offices in 3 major global locations, Sacramento, Orlando and Chennai.

OrganicApex was founded on January 2006 and has been delivering consistent value to partners and clients ever since. At OrganicApex, each team member is an expert in various avenues of Online Marketing. We specialize in Search Engine Optimization ( SEO ), Pay Per Click Advertising (PPC), Search Engine friendly Web Design, Strategic Link Building, Social Media Marketing and Search Engine Reputation Management.

Our clients range from small start up companies to large corporations â€“ delivering consistent results and success with each client. Our primary mission is to provide results-based high quality online marketing solutions, because afterall, its results that matter.
